mapper.select: /* retrieveGenTssBIzDptMmList (일반과제 포트폴리오 인원통계 : 1. FUNDING 구조)*/ WITH TOTAL_CLS_MM AS ( SELECT SUM(ROUND((A.PTC_PRO / 100),2)) AS TOTAL_MM FROM IRIS_MM_CLS A WHERE A.MM_YYMM BETWEEN #{searchStartYymm} AND #{searchEndYymm} ) , BIZ_DPT_CLS_MM AS ( SELECT A.COM_DTL_CD , A.COM_DTL_NM , ISNULL(B.PROD_G_MM,0) AS PROD_G_MM , ISNULL(B.TOTAL_MM,0) AS TOTAL_MM , ISNULL(ROUND((B.PROD_G_MM / B.TOTAL_MM) * 100,1),0) AS MM_RATE FROM IRIS_ADM_COM_CD A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT C.BIZ_DPT_CD , SUM(ROUND((A.PTC_PRO / 100),2)) AS PROD_G_MM , (SELECT TOP 1 X.TOTAL_MM FROM TOTAL_CLS_MM X) AS TOTAL_MM FROM IRIS_MM_CLS A -- PG기준 과제 MM테이블 INNER JOIN IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST C ON A.PRJ_CD = C.PRJ_CD AND A.TSS_CD = C.TSS_CD AND C.TSS_SCN_CD = 'G' WHERE A.MM_YYMM BETWEEN #{searchStartYymm} AND #{searchEndYymm} GROUP BY C.BIZ_DPT_CD ) AS B ON A.COM_DTL_CD = B.BIZ_DPT_CD WHERE A.COM_CD_CD = 'BIZ_DPT_CD' AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' ) SELECT A.COM_DTL_CD as comDtlCd , A.COM_DTL_NM as comDtlNm , A.PROD_G_MM as prodGMm , A.TOTAL_MM as totalMm , A.MM_RATE as mmRate FROM BIZ_DPT_CLS_MM A UNION ALL SELECT '99' as comDtlCd , 'Sum(합계)' as comDtlNm , A.TOTAL_MM as prodGMm , A.TOTAL_MM as totalMm , (SELECT SUM(X.MM_RATE) FROM BIZ_DPT_CLS_MM X) as mmRate FROM TOTAL_CLS_MM A

/* retrieveGenTssDayDiffMmList (일반과제 포트폴리오 인원통계 : 2. 기간)*/ WITH TOTAL_CLS_MM AS ( SELECT SUM(ROUND((A.PTC_PRO / 100),2)) AS TOTAL_MM FROM IRIS_MM_CLS A INNER JOIN IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST C ON A.PRJ_CD = C.PRJ_CD AND A.TSS_CD = C.TSS_CD AND C.TSS_SCN_CD = 'G' WHERE A.MM_YYMM BETWEEN #{searchStartYymm} AND #{searchEndYymm} ) , DAY_DIFF AS ( SELECT '01' AS DAY_DIFF_TYPE UNION SELECT '02' AS DAY_DIFF_TYPE ) , DAY_DIFF_CLS_MM AS ( SELECT A.DAY_DIFF_TYPE , (CASE WHEN A.DAY_DIFF_TYPE = '01' THEN '단기' WHEN A.DAY_DIFF_TYPE = '02' THEN '장기' ELSE '' END ) AS DAY_DIFF_TYPE_NM , ISNULL(B.PROD_G_MM,0) AS PROD_G_MM , ISNULL(ROUND((B.PROD_G_MM / B.TOTAL_MM) * 100,1),0) AS MM_RATE FROM DAY_DIFF A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A1.DAY_DIFF_TYPE , SUM(A1.PROD_G_MM) AS PROD_G_MM , A1.TOTAL_MM FROM ( SELECT (CASE WHEN ISNULL(DATEDIFF( DAY , C.TSS_STRT_DD , C.TSS_FNH_DD ),0) <= 730 THEN '01' ELSE '02' END) AS DAY_DIFF_TYPE , ROUND((A.PTC_PRO / 100),2) AS PROD_G_MM , (SELECT TOP 1 X.TOTAL_MM FROM TOTAL_CLS_MM X) AS TOTAL_MM FROM IRIS_MM_CLS A INNER JOIN IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST C ON A.PRJ_CD = C.PRJ_CD AND A.TSS_CD = C.TSS_CD AND C.TSS_SCN_CD = 'G' WHERE A.MM_YYMM BETWEEN #{searchStartYymm} AND #{searchEndYymm} ) A1 GROUP BY A1.DAY_DIFF_TYPE, A1.TOTAL_MM ) AS B ON A.DAY_DIFF_TYPE = B.DAY_DIFF_TYPE ) SELECT A.DAY_DIFF_TYPE as dayDiffType , A.DAY_DIFF_TYPE_NM as dayDiffTypeNm , A.PROD_G_MM as prodGMm , A.MM_RATE as mmRate FROM DAY_DIFF_CLS_MM A UNION ALL SELECT '99' as dayDiffType , 'Sum(합계)' as dayDiffTypeNm , A.TOTAL_MM as prodGMm , (SELECT SUM(X.MM_RATE) FROM DAY_DIFF_CLS_MM X) as mmRate FROM TOTAL_CLS_MM A

/* retrieveGenTssAttrMmList (일반과제 포트폴리오 인원통계 : 3. 과제속성)*/ WITH TOTAL_CLS_MM AS ( SELECT SUM(ROUND((A.PTC_PRO / 100),2)) AS TOTAL_MM FROM IRIS_MM_CLS A INNER JOIN IRIS_PRJ_RSST_CLS B ON A.PRJ_CD = B.PRJ_CD AND A.MM_YYMM = B.PRJ_CLS_YYMM AND B.PRJ_CLS_YN = 'Y' -- 월마감 완료건 INNER JOIN IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST C ON A.PRJ_CD = C.PRJ_CD AND A.TSS_CD = C.TSS_CD AND C.TSS_SCN_CD = 'G' WHERE A.MM_YYMM BETWEEN #{searchStartYymm} AND #{searchEndYymm} ) , ATTR_CLS_MM AS ( SELECT A.COM_DTL_CD , A.COM_DTL_NM , ISNULL(B.PROD_G_MM,0) AS PROD_G_MM , ISNULL(B.TOTAL_MM,0) AS TOTAL_MM , ISNULL(ROUND((B.PROD_G_MM / B.TOTAL_MM) * 100,1),0) AS MM_RATE FROM IRIS_ADM_COM_CD A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT C.TSS_ATTR_CD , SUM(ROUND((A.PTC_PRO / 100),2)) AS PROD_G_MM , (SELECT TOP 1 X.TOTAL_MM FROM TOTAL_CLS_MM X) AS TOTAL_MM FROM IRIS_MM_CLS A -- PG기준 과제 MM테이블 INNER JOIN IRIS_PRJ_RSST_CLS B ON A.PRJ_CD = B.PRJ_CD AND A.MM_YYMM = B.PRJ_CLS_YYMM AND B.PRJ_CLS_YN = 'Y' -- 월마감 완료건 INNER JOIN IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST C ON A.PRJ_CD = C.PRJ_CD AND A.TSS_CD = C.TSS_CD AND C.TSS_SCN_CD = 'G' WHERE A.MM_YYMM BETWEEN #{searchStartYymm} AND #{searchEndYymm} GROUP BY C.TSS_ATTR_CD ) AS B ON A.COM_DTL_CD = B.TSS_ATTR_CD WHERE A.COM_CD_CD = 'TSS_ATTR_CD' AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' ) SELECT A.COM_DTL_CD as comDtlCd , A.COM_DTL_NM as comDtlNm , A.PROD_G_MM as prodGMm , A.TOTAL_MM as totalMm , A.MM_RATE as mmRate FROM ATTR_CLS_MM A UNION ALL SELECT '99' as comDtlCd , 'Sum(합계)' as comDtlNm , A.TOTAL_MM as prodGMm , A.TOTAL_MM as totalMm , (SELECT SUM(X.MM_RATE) FROM ATTR_CLS_MM X) as mmRate FROM TOTAL_CLS_MM A

/* retrieveGenTssSpheMmList (일반과제 포트폴리오 인원통계 : 4. 연구분야)*/ WITH TOTAL_CLS_MM AS ( SELECT SUM(ROUND((A.PTC_PRO / 100),2)) AS TOTAL_MM FROM IRIS_MM_CLS A INNER JOIN IRIS_PRJ_RSST_CLS B ON A.PRJ_CD = B.PRJ_CD AND A.MM_YYMM = B.PRJ_CLS_YYMM AND B.PRJ_CLS_YN = 'Y' -- 월마감 완료건 INNER JOIN IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST C ON A.PRJ_CD = C.PRJ_CD AND A.TSS_CD = C.TSS_CD AND C.TSS_SCN_CD = 'G' WHERE A.MM_YYMM BETWEEN #{searchStartYymm} AND #{searchEndYymm} ) , SPHE_CLS_MM AS ( SELECT A.COM_DTL_CD , A.COM_DTL_NM , ISNULL(B.PROD_G_MM,0) AS PROD_G_MM , ISNULL(B.TOTAL_MM,0) AS TOTAL_MM , ISNULL(ROUND((B.PROD_G_MM / B.TOTAL_MM) * 100,1),0) AS MM_RATE FROM IRIS_ADM_COM_CD A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT C.RSST_SPHE , SUM(ROUND((A.PTC_PRO / 100),2)) AS PROD_G_MM , (SELECT TOP 1 X.TOTAL_MM FROM TOTAL_CLS_MM X) AS TOTAL_MM FROM IRIS_MM_CLS A -- PG기준 과제 MM테이블 INNER JOIN IRIS_PRJ_RSST_CLS B ON A.PRJ_CD = B.PRJ_CD AND A.MM_YYMM = B.PRJ_CLS_YYMM AND B.PRJ_CLS_YN = 'Y' -- 월마감 완료건 INNER JOIN IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST C ON A.PRJ_CD = C.PRJ_CD AND A.TSS_CD = C.TSS_CD AND C.TSS_SCN_CD = 'G' WHERE A.MM_YYMM BETWEEN #{searchStartYymm} AND #{searchEndYymm} GROUP BY C.RSST_SPHE ) AS B ON A.COM_DTL_CD = B.RSST_SPHE WHERE A.COM_CD_CD = 'RSST_SPHE' AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' ) SELECT A.COM_DTL_CD as comDtlCd , A.COM_DTL_NM as comDtlNm , A.PROD_G_MM as prodGMm , A.TOTAL_MM as totalMm , A.MM_RATE as mmRate FROM SPHE_CLS_MM A UNION ALL SELECT '99' as comDtlCd , 'Sum(합계)' as comDtlNm , A.TOTAL_MM as prodGMm , A.TOTAL_MM as totalMm , (SELECT SUM(X.MM_RATE) FROM SPHE_CLS_MM X) as mmRate FROM TOTAL_CLS_MM A

/* retrieveGenTssTypeMmList (일반과제 포트폴리오 인원통계 : 5. 유형)*/ WITH TOTAL_CLS_MM AS ( SELECT SUM(ROUND((A.PTC_PRO / 100),2)) AS TOTAL_MM FROM IRIS_MM_CLS A INNER JOIN IRIS_PRJ_RSST_CLS B ON A.PRJ_CD = B.PRJ_CD AND A.MM_YYMM = B.PRJ_CLS_YYMM AND B.PRJ_CLS_YN = 'Y' -- 월마감 완료건 INNER JOIN IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST C ON A.PRJ_CD = C.PRJ_CD AND A.TSS_CD = C.TSS_CD AND C.TSS_SCN_CD = 'G' WHERE A.MM_YYMM BETWEEN #{searchStartYymm} AND #{searchEndYymm} ) , TYPE_CLS_MM AS ( SELECT A.COM_DTL_CD , A.COM_DTL_NM , ISNULL(B.PROD_G_MM,0) AS PROD_G_MM , ISNULL(B.TOTAL_MM,0) AS TOTAL_MM , ISNULL(ROUND((B.PROD_G_MM / B.TOTAL_MM) * 100,1),0) AS MM_RATE FROM IRIS_ADM_COM_CD A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT C.TSS_TYPE , SUM(ROUND((A.PTC_PRO / 100),2)) AS PROD_G_MM , (SELECT TOP 1 X.TOTAL_MM FROM TOTAL_CLS_MM X) AS TOTAL_MM FROM IRIS_MM_CLS A -- PG기준 과제 MM테이블 INNER JOIN IRIS_PRJ_RSST_CLS B ON A.PRJ_CD = B.PRJ_CD AND A.MM_YYMM = B.PRJ_CLS_YYMM AND B.PRJ_CLS_YN = 'Y' -- 월마감 완료건 INNER JOIN IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST C ON A.PRJ_CD = C.PRJ_CD AND A.TSS_CD = C.TSS_CD AND C.TSS_SCN_CD = 'G' WHERE A.MM_YYMM BETWEEN #{searchStartYymm} AND #{searchEndYymm} GROUP BY C.TSS_TYPE ) AS B ON A.COM_DTL_CD = B.TSS_TYPE WHERE A.COM_CD_CD = 'TSS_TYPE' AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' ) SELECT A.COM_DTL_CD as comDtlCd , A.COM_DTL_NM as comDtlNm , A.PROD_G_MM as prodGMm , A.TOTAL_MM as totalMm , A.MM_RATE as mmRate FROM TYPE_CLS_MM A UNION ALL SELECT 'ZZ' as comDtlCd , 'Sum(합계)' as comDtlNm , A.TOTAL_MM as prodGMm , A.TOTAL_MM as totalMm , (SELECT SUM(X.MM_RATE) FROM TYPE_CLS_MM X) as mmRate FROM TOTAL_CLS_MM A

/* retrievePtfloFunding_a */ WITH EXP_LIST AS ( SELECT BIZ_DPT_CD, ROUND(PLN_EXP/100,2) as PLN_EXP , SUM(PLN_EXP/100) OVER() AS PLN_EXP_SUM , ROUND(ARSL_EXP/100, 2) as ARSL_EXP, SUM(ARSL_EXP/100) OVER() AS ARSL_EXP_SUM FROM (SELECT A.BIZ_DPT_CD, SUM(B.PLN_EXP) AS PLN_EXP, SUM(B.ARSL_EXP) AS ARSL_EXP FROM IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST A JOIN (SELECT TSS_CD, SUM(ISNULL(PLN_EXP,0)) AS PLN_EXP, SUM(ISNULL(ARSL_EXP, 0)) AS ARSL_EXP FROM IRIS_TSS_GEN_TRWI_BUDG_LIST WHERE YY_MM BETWEEN replace( #{searchStartYymm}, '-', '') AND replace( #{searchEndYymm}, '-', '') GROUP BY TSS_CD) B ON B.TSS_CD = A.TSS_CD WHERE A.TSS_SCN_CD = 'G' AND A.PGS_STEP_CD = 'PG' GROUP BY A.BIZ_DPT_CD) X ) select m.* from ( SELECT A.COM_DTL_CD AS comDelCd , A.COM_DTL_NM AS comDelNm , ISNULL(EL.ARSL_EXP,0) AS arslExp , ISNULL(CONVERT(NUMERIC(5,2), ROUND((EL.ARSL_EXP/CASE WHEN EL.ARSL_EXP_SUM = 0 THEN 1 ELSE EL.ARSL_EXP_SUM END)*100,2)),0) AS arslExpSum FROM IRIS_ADM_COM_CD A LEFT JOIN EXP_LIST EL ON A.COM_DTL_CD = EL.BIZ_DPT_CD WHERE A.COM_CD_CD = 'BIZ_DPT_CD' UNION ALL SELECT '99','Sum(합계)' , ROUND(SUM(EL.ARSL_EXP), 2) , ROUND(SUM(CONVERT(NUMERIC(5,2), ROUND((EL.ARSL_EXP/CASE WHEN EL.ARSL_EXP_SUM = 0 THEN 1 ELSE EL.ARSL_EXP_SUM END)*100,2))), 0) FROM EXP_LIST EL ) m where 1=1 and (m.arslExp <> '0' and arslExpSum <> '0')

/* retrievePtfloFunding_p */ WITH CLS_LIST AS ( SELECT BIZ_DPT_CD, ROUND(PROD_G_MM, 2 ) AS PROD_G_MM, SUM(PROD_G_MM) OVER() AS PROD_G_SUM FROM (SELECT C.BIZ_DPT_CD , SUM(ROUND((A.PTC_PRO / 100),2)) AS PROD_G_MM FROM IRIS_MM_CLS A -- PG기준 과제 MM테이블 INNER JOIN IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST C ON A.TSS_CD = C.TSS_CD AND A.PRJ_CD = C.PRJ_CD AND C.TSS_SCN_CD = 'G' AND C.DEL_YN = 'N' and c.PGS_STEP_CD ='PG' WHERE A.MM_YYMM BETWEEN #{searchStartYymm} AND #{searchEndYymm} GROUP BY C.BIZ_DPT_CD) X ) select m.* from ( SELECT A.COM_DTL_CD AS comDelCd , A.COM_DTL_NM AS comDelNm , round(ISNULL(CL.PROD_G_MM / (DATEDIFF(month , convert(datetime, #{searchStartYymm}+'-01'), convert(datetime, #{searchEndYymm}+'-01'))+1),0),2) AS prodGMm , ISNULL(CONVERT(NUMERIC(5,2),ROUND((CL.PROD_G_MM/CASE WHEN CL.PROD_G_SUM = 0 THEN 1 ELSE CL.PROD_G_SUM END)*100,2)), 0) AS prodGMmSum FROM IRIS_ADM_COM_CD A LEFT JOIN CLS_LIST CL ON A.COM_DTL_CD = CL.BIZ_DPT_CD WHERE A.COM_CD_CD = 'BIZ_DPT_CD' UNION ALL SELECT '99','Sum(합계)' , ROUND(SUM(CL.PROD_G_MM) / (DATEDIFF(month , convert(datetime, #{searchStartYymm}+'-01'), convert(datetime, #{searchEndYymm}+'-01'))+1) , 2) , ROUND(SUM(CONVERT(NUMERIC(5,2),ROUND((CL.PROD_G_MM/CASE WHEN CL.PROD_G_SUM = 0 THEN 1 ELSE CL.PROD_G_SUM END)*100,2))),0) FROM CLS_LIST CL ) m where 1=1 and (m.prodGMm <> '0' and prodGMmSum <> '0')

/* retrievePtfloTrm_a */ WITH EXP_LIST AS ( SELECT DAY_DIFF_TYPE , ROUND(ARSL_EXP / 100, 2) AS ARSL_EXP , SUM(ARSL_EXP) OVER() AS ARSL_EXP_SUM FROM (SELECT (CASE WHEN ISNULL(DATEDIFF(DAY, A.TSS_STRT_DD, A.TSS_FNH_DD ),0) <= 730 THEN '01' ELSE '02' END) AS DAY_DIFF_TYPE , SUM(B.ARSL_EXP) AS ARSL_EXP FROM IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST A JOIN (SELECT TSS_CD, SUM(ISNULL(PLN_EXP,0)) AS PLN_EXP, SUM(ISNULL(ARSL_EXP, 0)) AS ARSL_EXP FROM IRIS_TSS_GEN_TRWI_BUDG_LIST WHERE YY_MM BETWEEN replace(#{searchStartYymm}, '-', '') AND replace(#{searchEndYymm}, '-', '') GROUP BY TSS_CD) B ON B.TSS_CD = A.TSS_CD WHERE A.TSS_SCN_CD = 'G' AND A.PGS_STEP_CD = 'PG' AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' GROUP BY (CASE WHEN ISNULL(DATEDIFF(DAY, A.TSS_STRT_DD, A.TSS_FNH_DD ),0) <= 730 THEN '01' ELSE '02' END)) X )
SELECT A.COM_DTL_CD AS comDelCd , A.COM_DTL_NM AS comDelNm , ISNULL(EL.ARSL_EXP,0) AS arslExp , ISNULL(CONVERT(NUMERIC(5,2), ROUND((EL.ARSL_EXP/CASE WHEN EL.ARSL_EXP_SUM = 0 THEN 1 ELSE EL.ARSL_EXP_SUM END)*100,2)),0) AS arslExpSum FROM (SELECT '01' AS COM_DTL_CD, '단기' AS COM_DTL_NM UNION ALL SELECT '02', '장기' ) A LEFT JOIN EXP_LIST EL ON A.COM_DTL_CD = EL.DAY_DIFF_TYPE UNION ALL SELECT '99','Sum(합계)' , ROUND(SUM(EL.ARSL_EXP) , 2) , ROUND(SUM(CONVERT(NUMERIC(5,2), ROUND((EL.ARSL_EXP/CASE WHEN EL.ARSL_EXP_SUM = 0 THEN 1 ELSE EL.ARSL_EXP_SUM END)*100,2))),0) FROM EXP_LIST EL

/* retrievePtfloTrm_p */ WITH CLS_LIST AS ( SELECT DAY_DIFF_TYPE , ROUND(PROD_G_MM, 2) AS PROD_G_MM , SUM(PROD_G_MM) OVER() AS PROD_G_SUM FROM (SELECT (CASE WHEN ISNULL(DATEDIFF(DAY, C.TSS_STRT_DD , C.TSS_FNH_DD ),0) <= 730 THEN '01' ELSE '02' END) AS DAY_DIFF_TYPE , SUM(ROUND((A.PTC_PRO / 100),2)) AS PROD_G_MM FROM IRIS_MM_CLS A INNER JOIN IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST C ON A.TSS_CD = C.TSS_CD AND A.PRJ_CD = C.PRJ_CD AND C.TSS_SCN_CD = 'G' AND C.DEL_YN = 'N' and c.PGS_STEP_CD ='PG' WHERE A.MM_YYMM BETWEEN #{searchStartYymm} AND #{searchEndYymm} GROUP BY (CASE WHEN ISNULL(DATEDIFF(DAY, C.TSS_STRT_DD , C.TSS_FNH_DD ),0) <= 730 THEN '01' ELSE '02' END)) X ) SELECT A.COM_DTL_CD AS comDelCd , A.COM_DTL_NM AS comDelNm , round(ISNULL(CL.PROD_G_MM / (DATEDIFF(month , convert(datetime, #{searchStartYymm}+'-01'), convert(datetime, #{searchEndYymm}+'-01'))+1),0),2) AS prodGMm , ISNULL(CONVERT(NUMERIC(5,2),ROUND((CL.PROD_G_MM/CASE WHEN CL.PROD_G_SUM = 0 THEN 1 ELSE CL.PROD_G_SUM END)*100,2)), 0) AS prodGMmSum FROM (SELECT '01' AS COM_DTL_CD, '단기' AS COM_DTL_NM UNION ALL SELECT '02', '장기' ) A , CLS_LIST CL WHERE A.COM_DTL_CD = CL.DAY_DIFF_TYPE UNION ALL SELECT '99','Sum(합계)' , ROUND(SUM(CL.PROD_G_MM) / (DATEDIFF(month , convert(datetime, #{searchStartYymm}+'-01'), convert(datetime, #{searchEndYymm}+'-01'))+1) , 2) , ROUND(SUM(CONVERT(NUMERIC(5,2),ROUND((CL.PROD_G_MM/CASE WHEN CL.PROD_G_SUM = 0 THEN 1 ELSE CL.PROD_G_SUM END)*100,2))),0) FROM CLS_LIST CL

/* retrievePtfloAttr_a */ WITH EXP_LIST AS ( SELECT TSS_ATTR_CD, ROUND(PLN_EXP, 2) AS PLN_EXP, SUM(PLN_EXP) OVER() AS PLN_EXP_SUM , ROUND(ARSL_EXP / 100, 2) AS ARSL_EXP, SUM(ARSL_EXP) OVER() AS ARSL_EXP_SUM FROM (SELECT A.TSS_ATTR_CD, SUM(B.PLN_EXP) AS PLN_EXP, SUM(B.ARSL_EXP) AS ARSL_EXP FROM IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST A JOIN (SELECT TSS_CD, SUM(ISNULL(PLN_EXP,0)) AS PLN_EXP, SUM(ISNULL(ARSL_EXP, 0)) AS ARSL_EXP FROM IRIS_TSS_GEN_TRWI_BUDG_LIST WHERE YY_MM BETWEEN replace(#{searchStartYymm}, '-', '') AND replace(#{searchEndYymm}, '-', '') GROUP BY TSS_CD) B ON B.TSS_CD = A.TSS_CD WHERE A.TSS_SCN_CD = 'G' AND A.PGS_STEP_CD = 'PG' AND A.TSS_ATTR_CD != ' ' GROUP BY A.TSS_ATTR_CD) X )
SELECT A.COM_DTL_CD AS comDelCd , A.COM_DTL_NM AS comDelNm , ISNULL(EL.ARSL_EXP,0) AS arslExp , ISNULL(CONVERT(NUMERIC(5,2), ROUND((EL.ARSL_EXP/CASE WHEN EL.ARSL_EXP_SUM = 0 THEN 1 ELSE EL.ARSL_EXP_SUM END)*100,2)),0) AS arslExpSum FROM IRIS_ADM_COM_CD A LEFT JOIN EXP_LIST EL ON A.COM_DTL_CD = EL.TSS_ATTR_CD WHERE A.COM_CD_CD = 'TSS_ATTR_CD' UNION ALL SELECT '99','Sum(합계)' , ROUND(SUM(EL.ARSL_EXP), 2) , ROUND(SUM(CONVERT(NUMERIC(5,2), ROUND((EL.ARSL_EXP/CASE WHEN EL.ARSL_EXP_SUM = 0 THEN 1 ELSE EL.ARSL_EXP_SUM END)*100,2))), 0) FROM EXP_LIST EL

/* retrievePtfloAttr_p */ WITH CLS_LIST AS ( SELECT TSS_ATTR_CD, ROUND(PROD_G_MM, 2) AS PROD_G_MM, SUM(PROD_G_MM) OVER() AS PROD_G_SUM FROM (SELECT C.TSS_ATTR_CD , SUM(ROUND((A.PTC_PRO / 100),2)) AS PROD_G_MM FROM IRIS_MM_CLS A -- PG기준 과제 MM테이블 INNER JOIN IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST C ON A.TSS_CD = C.TSS_CD AND A.PRJ_CD = C.PRJ_CD AND C.TSS_SCN_CD = 'G' AND C.DEL_YN = 'N' and c.PGS_STEP_CD ='PG' WHERE C.TSS_ATTR_CD != ' ' AND A.MM_YYMM BETWEEN #{searchStartYymm} AND #{searchEndYymm} GROUP BY C.TSS_ATTR_CD) X ) SELECT A.COM_DTL_CD AS comDelCd , A.COM_DTL_NM AS comDelNm , round(ISNULL(CL.PROD_G_MM / (DATEDIFF(month , convert(datetime, #{searchStartYymm}+'-01'), convert(datetime, #{searchEndYymm}+'-01'))+1),0),2) AS prodGMm , ISNULL(CONVERT(NUMERIC(5,2),ROUND((CL.PROD_G_MM/CASE WHEN CL.PROD_G_SUM = 0 THEN 1 ELSE CL.PROD_G_SUM END)*100,2)), 0) AS prodGMmSum FROM IRIS_ADM_COM_CD A LEFT JOIN CLS_LIST CL ON A.COM_DTL_CD = CL.TSS_ATTR_CD WHERE A.COM_CD_CD = 'TSS_ATTR_CD' UNION ALL SELECT '99','Sum(합계)' , ROUND(SUM(CL.PROD_G_MM) / (DATEDIFF(month , convert(datetime, #{searchStartYymm}+'-01'), convert(datetime, #{searchEndYymm}+'-01'))+1) , 2) , ROUND(SUM(CONVERT(NUMERIC(5,2),ROUND((CL.PROD_G_MM/CASE WHEN CL.PROD_G_SUM = 0 THEN 1 ELSE CL.PROD_G_SUM END)*100,2))),0) FROM CLS_LIST CL

/* retrievePtfloSphe_a */ WITH EXP_LIST AS ( SELECT RSST_SPHE, ROUND(PLN_EXP, 2) AS PLN_EXP, SUM(PLN_EXP) OVER() AS PLN_EXP_SUM , ROUND(ARSL_EXP / 100, 2) AS ARSL_EXP, SUM(ARSL_EXP) OVER() AS ARSL_EXP_SUM FROM (SELECT A.RSST_SPHE, SUM(B.PLN_EXP) AS PLN_EXP, SUM(B.ARSL_EXP) AS ARSL_EXP FROM IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST A JOIN (SELECT TSS_CD, SUM(ISNULL(PLN_EXP,0)) AS PLN_EXP, SUM(ISNULL(ARSL_EXP, 0)) AS ARSL_EXP FROM IRIS_TSS_GEN_TRWI_BUDG_LIST WHERE YY_MM BETWEEN replace(#{searchStartYymm}, '-', '') AND replace(#{searchEndYymm}, '-', '') GROUP BY TSS_CD) B ON B.TSS_CD = A.TSS_CD WHERE A.TSS_SCN_CD = 'G' AND A.PGS_STEP_CD = 'PG' AND A.RSST_SPHE IS NOT NULL GROUP BY A.RSST_SPHE) X )
SELECT A.COM_DTL_CD AS comDelCd , A.COM_DTL_NM AS comDelNm , ISNULL(EL.ARSL_EXP,0) AS arslExp , ISNULL(CONVERT(NUMERIC(5,2), ROUND((EL.ARSL_EXP/CASE WHEN EL.ARSL_EXP_SUM = 0 THEN 1 ELSE EL.ARSL_EXP_SUM END)*100,2)),0) AS arslExpSum FROM IRIS_ADM_COM_CD A LEFT JOIN EXP_LIST EL ON A.COM_DTL_CD = EL.RSST_SPHE WHERE A.COM_CD_CD = 'RSST_SPHE' UNION ALL SELECT '99','Sum(합계)' , ROUND(SUM(EL.ARSL_EXP), 2) , ROUND(SUM(CONVERT(NUMERIC(5,2), ROUND((EL.ARSL_EXP/CASE WHEN EL.ARSL_EXP_SUM = 0 THEN 1 ELSE EL.ARSL_EXP_SUM END)*100,2))),0) FROM EXP_LIST EL

/* retrievePtfloSphe_p */ WITH CLS_LIST AS ( SELECT RSST_SPHE, ROUND(PROD_G_MM, 2) AS PROD_G_MM, SUM(PROD_G_MM) OVER() AS PROD_G_SUM FROM (SELECT C.RSST_SPHE , SUM(ROUND((A.PTC_PRO / 100),2)) AS PROD_G_MM FROM IRIS_MM_CLS A -- PG기준 과제 MM테이블 INNER JOIN IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST C ON A.PRJ_CD = C.PRJ_CD AND A.TSS_CD = C.TSS_CD AND C.TSS_SCN_CD = 'G' AND C.DEL_YN = 'N' and c.PGS_STEP_CD ='PG' WHERE C.RSST_SPHE IS NOT NULL AND A.MM_YYMM BETWEEN #{searchStartYymm} AND #{searchEndYymm} GROUP BY C.RSST_SPHE) X ) SELECT A.COM_DTL_CD AS comDelCd , A.COM_DTL_NM AS comDelNm , round(ISNULL(CL.PROD_G_MM / (DATEDIFF(month , convert(datetime, #{searchStartYymm}+'-01'), convert(datetime, #{searchEndYymm}+'-01'))+1),0),2) AS prodGMm , ISNULL(CONVERT(NUMERIC(5,2),ROUND((CL.PROD_G_MM/CASE WHEN CL.PROD_G_SUM = 0 THEN 1 ELSE CL.PROD_G_SUM END)*100,2)), 0) AS prodGMmSum FROM IRIS_ADM_COM_CD A LEFT JOIN CLS_LIST CL ON A.COM_DTL_CD = CL.RSST_SPHE WHERE A.COM_CD_CD = 'RSST_SPHE' UNION ALL SELECT '99','Sum(합계)' , ROUND(SUM(CL.PROD_G_MM) / (DATEDIFF(month , convert(datetime, #{searchStartYymm}+'-01'), convert(datetime, #{searchEndYymm}+'-01'))+1) , 2) , ROUND(SUM(CONVERT(NUMERIC(5,2),ROUND((CL.PROD_G_MM/CASE WHEN CL.PROD_G_SUM = 0 THEN 1 ELSE CL.PROD_G_SUM END)*100,2))),0) FROM CLS_LIST CL

SELECT A.COM_DTL_CD AS comDelCd , A.COM_DTL_NM AS comDelNm , ISNULL(EL.ARSL_EXP,0) AS arslExp , ISNULL(CONVERT(NUMERIC(5,2), ROUND((EL.ARSL_EXP/CASE WHEN EL.ARSL_EXP_SUM = 0 THEN 1 ELSE EL.ARSL_EXP_SUM END)*100,2)),0) AS arslExpSum FROM IRIS_ADM_COM_CD A LEFT JOIN EXP_LIST EL ON A.COM_DTL_CD = EL.TSS_TYPE WHERE A.COM_CD_CD = 'TSS_TYPE' UNION ALL SELECT '99','Sum(합계)' , ROUND(SUM(EL.ARSL_EXP), 2) , ROUND(SUM(CONVERT(NUMERIC(5,2), ROUND((EL.ARSL_EXP/CASE WHEN EL.ARSL_EXP_SUM = 0 THEN 1 ELSE EL.ARSL_EXP_SUM END)*100,2))), 0) FROM EXP_LIST EL
